title: Sorrow
description: Ashley is nervous when, in the middle of the night, the frighteningly handsome yet eerily Michael comes to her house. Michael seems to understand the pain of loneliness and death and Ashley’s desperate thoughts of her dying mother. When Michael reveals that he’s a member of the undead, a vampire looking for something he never had and a dark purpose. Ashley must let her heart guide her through a tangle of fear and desire.
author: Jason A. Fischer
